snippet: The United States Holocaust Memorial Museum has already begun to observe its 20th anniversary and has hired agencyEA in Chicago to run its education and memorial tours next year.
abstract: Advertising column observes the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum has hired agencyEA in Chicago to run its education and memorial tours to help with their 20th anniversary events in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The United States Holocaust Memorial Museum has already begun to observe its 20th anniversary and has hired agencyEA in Chicago to run its education and memorial tours next year.

headline.seo: Holocaust Museum Plans Call to Action for 20th Anniversary Campaign
headline.main: At 20, Holocaust Museum Plans a Call to Action
headline.print_headline: At 20, Holocaust Museum Plans a Call to Action
